name: Ballet for Beginners
description: Introduction to classical ballet technique, perfect for those starting their dance journey.

name: Contemporary Dance
description: Explore modern movement and expression through contemporary dance techniques.

name: Hip-Hop
description: Learn urban dance styles with high energy and creative choreography.

name: Salsa & Latin
description: Feel the rhythm of Latin music while learning salsa, bachata, and merengue.

name: Jazz Dance
description: Dynamic and expressive jazz technique with Broadway-style choreography.

name: Kids Dance (Ages 6-10)
description: Fun and creative dance classes designed specifically for young dancers.
